ygData.subject: Re: RE: Hunting at 14
ygData.msgSnippet: The other option is to bind yourself down the stairs in the necro guild. Just my humble opinion though. ... From:  To:
ygData.messageBody:
The other option is to bind yourself down the stairs in the necro guild.
Just my humble opinion though.
----- Original Message -----
From: <TkAdam@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 15, 1999 7:23 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] RE: Hunting at 14


> From: TkAdam@...
>
> In a message dated 7/15/99 10:09:25 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
> srutkowski@... writes:
>
> > You kill the NPC vendors on the sister island in OOT? I thought they
were
> > higher level than that. Playing a dark elf necro and binding yourself
in
> > Freeport is not something I would do, even if I killed "one MILLION"
orcs.
>
> As a dark elf necro... EXCEPT for the wizards guild (which I have always
> widely avoided) I have NEVER had a problem EAST or WEST freeport.
> Now binding yourself in the necro guild in West Freeport would not be a
bad
> idea at all.
>
> NORTH Freeport is a different matter. I would not bind myself there, but
I
> have also not had any problems there after my reign of terror on ORCS for
> nearly a month. I have killed well over a thousand orcs... So many orcs
> that the Rivervale GUARD (not merchants) are actually amiable to me... (I
am
> still KOS by rivervale merchants...but I am working on that...)
>
> Sonoroud tomebinder.
>
